title: 1357 Finley St NE #B
description: Welcome to the Finley Street Cottages! A car-lite community where preservation meets progress in a distinctive collection of homes for everyone. Inspired by the historical footprint of two 1920's Craftsman Bungalows that have been lovingly reimagined, this incredible collection of 1, 2, & 3 bedroom homes effortlessly merges neighborly charm with modern amenities.  Just a few short blocks from Edgewood Retail & the Candler Park/Edgewood Marta Station & less than a 15 minute bike ride to the Atlanta Beltline, Krog Street Market, Madison Yards, Candler Park, Downtown Kirkwood & MUCH MUCH MORE you'll love the location of your new home as much as the people & the place. Finley St Cottages has multiple units available for any lifestyle and is ready for neighbors to call home!

importantInformation.externalStorage: Not allowed more than 1 car owned by the tenants of the property, and there's a $75 discount for having no cars for this unit (plenty of covered bike & e-bike storage available!)
